title: Iron ore
creator_credit: Joe Scully, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: A survey of the mining, transporting and use of iron ore in the steel industry at Whyalla and Port Kembla. Indicates the various unused deposits of iron ore, especially in Western Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Joe Scully, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
description: A survey of the mining, transporting and use of iron ore in the steel industry at Whyalla and Port Kembla. Indicates the various unused deposits of iron ore, especially in Western Australia.
